plot: Set in the fictional town of Halwapur, Pakistan, the Burka Avenger follows the adventures of the school teacher-cum-superheroine Jiya dressed in a Ninja like Baku fighting using books and pens to protect the village school from closing.
title: Burka Avenger
plot_es: Set in the fictional town of Halwapur, Pakistan, the Burka Avenger follows the adventures of the school teacher-cum-superheroine Jiya dressed in a Ninja like Baku fighting using books and pens to protect the village school from closing.
